{{Wireless embedded system |brand=IgniteNet |model=ML-60-10G |revision=-360 |series= |asin=B078MS7BD3 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Accton |manuf_model=ML10G360 |availability=now |fcc_date=03/21/2018 |fcc_id=HEDML10G360, HEDML60PRS4601, |ic_id=3857A-ML10G360 |pcb_id=246000002223X |type=access point, bridge |pwr_v=48 |pwr_amp=1.35 |pwr_conn= |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=NXP <!-- Freescale (NXP) --> |cpu1_model=LS1046A;LS1046ASE8T1A; |cpu1_cspeed=1.6 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25U12835FMI-10G |fla2=4 GiB |fla2_brand=Micron |fla2_model=MT29F4G08ABBEAH4:E |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4A4G165WE-BCRC |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, SFP+, |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sfp_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_module=Accton 1830A-R0A |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9980 |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=QCA9980 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn=IPEX |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_module=IgniteNet RDO-60-FB-USBB-18BF |wi2_module_if=USB 3.0 |wi2_chip1_brand=Peraso |wi2_chip1_model=PRS4601 |wi2_chip2_brand=Peraso |wi2_chip2_model=PRS1151 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=ad |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211FS |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;4; |flags=WiGig, SFP+, |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac+ad |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=28:76:10 |oui_eth=28:76:10 }} {{TagLine|MetroLinq 10G Tri-Band Omni}} :[https://www.ignitenet.com/products/ML-10G-omni/ Product page]
*[[IgniteNet ML-60-10G-360]] - ''MetroLinq 10G Tri-Band Omni'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML10G360 HEDML10G360] (2018-03-21) / HEDML60PRS4601 (x3) :CPU: [[NXP]] ([[Freescale]]) [https://www.nxp.com/products/processors-and-microcontrollers/arm-based-processors-and-mcus/qoriq-layerscape-arm-processors/qoriq-layerscape-1043a-and-1023a-multicore-communications-processors:LS1046A LS1046A] (SE8T1A) @1.6GHz Quad Core :Flash: ''Micron'' MT29F4G08ABBEAH4:E (4GB) - NQ356 ::''Macronix'' MX25U12835FMI-10G (16MB SPI) :RAM: 4x ''Samsung'' K4A4G165WE-BCRC (2GB) :LAN: [[Freescale]] ''QorlQ'' LS1046A (10GbE SFP), [[Realtek]] RTL8211FS (1GbE) :WLAN: 3x [[Peraso]] PRS4601 (BB/MAC/PHY) + PRS1151 (RFIC) - USB 3.0 :2x [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 - 802.11ac (2.4/5GHz) Mini PCIe Module *[[IgniteNet RDO-60-FB-USBB-18BF]] - ''Metrolinq 60GHz Module'' (USB 3.0) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML60PRS4601 HEDML60PRS4601] (2017-10-26) • [[Accton]] :WLAN: [[Peraso]] PRS4601 (BB/MAC/PHY) + PRS1151 (RFIC) - X710 (?) ::"142000001731X REV:0B", "PER805-02", "1736" - [https://fccid.io/HEDML60PRS4601/External-Photos/External-Photos-3616968 PCB]
===News=== *[http://www.prweb.com/releases/2017/09/prweb14753392.htm ''IgniteNet MetroLinq 2.5G 60 Beamforming Sector'' on '''PCWeb'''] *[https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/ignitenet-announces-the-metrolinq-60-base-station-sector---worlds-first-commercial-60ghz-point-to-multipoint-broadband-system-300278895.html ''IgniteNet MetroLinq 60 Base Station Sector'' on '''PRNewsWire''']
===See also=== *[[IgniteNet ML-60-10G-360]] - ''MetroLinq 10G Tri-Band Omni'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML10G360 HEDML10G360] (2018-03-21) / HEDML60PRS4601 (x3) *[[IgniteNet ML-60-LW]] - ''MetroLinq LW Cloud Enabled 60GHz PTP/PTMP'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML60LW HEDML60LW] (2018-01-30) - ''w/ 5GHz Failover + 2GHz AP'' <!-- :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4018 @710MHz (Quad Core) WiSoC • [https://www.balticnetworks.com/ignitenet-metrolinq-lw-60ghz-cloud-enabled-ptp-ptmp-w-5ghz-failover-2ghz-ap.html BN] :WLAN: [[Peraso]] PRS4601 (BB/MAC/PHY) + PRS1151 (RFIC) (USB 3.0) :LAN: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8072 (1GbE) / HEDML60PRS4601 --> *[[IgniteNet ML2.5-60-BF-18]] - ''Metrolinq 2.5 Outdoor 60GHz PTMP + 5GHz'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML2560 HEDML2560] (2017-09-29) / HEDML60PRS4601 :*[[IgniteNet RDO-60-FB-USBB-18BF]] - ''Metrolinq 60GHz Module'' ::FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML60PRS4601 HEDML60PRS4601] (2017-10-26)
*[[IgniteNet ML-60-30-18]] - ''Metrolinq Outdoor 60GHz PTP + 5GHz'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HED-ML6035G3 HED-ML6035G3] (2016-05-11) / HED-ML60MDSB :*[[IgniteNet RDO-60-FB-USBB-18]] - ''Metrolinq 60GHz Module'' ::FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HED-ML60MDSB HED-ML60MDSB] (2016-05-05)
